import json
def answercheck(e, ans):
right_answer = [['A','1'],['B','2'],['C','3'],['D','5'],['B','4']]
parsed = json.loads(ans) answer = json.loads(parsed['answer'])
answer_sort = answer['pairings'].sort() right_answer_sort = right_answer.sort()
if answer_sort == right_answer_sort: return True else: return False
